name: gloom
description: A dark and gloomy pastel color syntax theme for Atom.
readme:
# [Gloom](https://atom.io/themes/gloom)   [![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/tag/hejrobin/gloom.svg)](https://github.com/hejrobin/gloom/releases) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/hejrobin/gloom.svg?style=social&label=Star)](https://github.com/hejrobin/gloom/stargazers)
<sup>For [Atom](https://atom.io/) 1.13 and later</sup>

A dark and gloomy pastel color syntax theme for Atom.
